name: Thirsty Work
description:
Thirsty Work

A game inspired by 'Lemonade Stand', one of the earliest PC videogames, originally made in 1973.  Its extremely simple 'business model', daily cycle, and random weather events made it a surprisingly intriguing and addictive game in its day.

Thirsty Work is an extension of that original 'business sim' concept, but incorporating stock levels, different drinks to sell, a leaderboard and random news events that may influence customer behaviour.

All made very simple.

As with all enterprises, success comes from wise choices and a little bit of luck.

'Check-in' and intervene as little or as often as you choose, as the days and nights keep on ticking by...
